title: Texans-Colts TNF Recap, Myles Garrett suspension upheld (Football 11/22)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to the Texans victory over the Colts on Thursday Night Football (2:00). The guys discuss poor coaching on both sides, how important the game was for the AFC Playoff Picture, T.Y. Hilton's struggles and more. Next, the Pick Six Superfriends analyze the NFL's decision to uphold Myles Garrett's suspension (25:00) before answering 5-star questions from Apple Podcasts (32:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
